alert.note: Alert for Central Horry; Coastal Horry; Northern Horry (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 15 at 1:15PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Horry County through 200 PM EDT... At 114 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Nixonville, or 8 miles east of Conway, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Little River, Hickory Grove, Wampee, Longs, Hammond, Goretown, Brooksville, Hand, Nixonville and Sea Coast Medical Center. This includes the following highways... SC Highway 31 between mile markers 22 and 24. SC Highway 22 between mile markers 10 and 26. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Central Horry; Coastal Horry; Northern Horry
